summary: Beneath the rooftops of Paris - The song is no longer the same. Beneath the rooftops of Paris today, it's sweltering... Above all, when one is very old, or very poor ... Dying slowly in ... See full summary »
cast: Michel Piccoli|Mylène Demongeot|Maurice Bénichou|Marie Kremer|Birol Ünel|Rudi Rosenberg|Vincent Tepernowski|Nicolas Pignon|Mado Maurin|Sandrine Briard|Serge Chambon
title: Sous les toits de Paris
